questions.question: 1.The molecular weight of FITC dye was :

answers.a: The separation of the excitation wavelength maximum and the emission wavelength maximum.
answers.b: The separation of the excitation wavelength maximum and the emission wavelength minimum.
answers.c: The separation of the excitation wavelength minimum and the emission wavelength minimum.
answers.d: The separation of the excitation wavelength minimum and the emission wavelength maximum.

questions.question: 3.FITC dye have two isomers.ie Isomer I and isomer II. Isomer I was different from isomer II by :

answers.a: Thiocyanate group on the 4th carbon of benzene ring
answers.b: Thiocyanate group on the 3rd carbon of benzene ring
answers.c: Thiocyanate group on the 5th carbon of benzene ring
answers.d: Thiocyanate group on the 6th carbon of benzene ring

questions.question: 4.Isomer II was different from isomer I by :

answers.a: Thiocyanate group on the 4th carbon of benzene ring
answers.b: Thiocyanate group on the 3rd carbon of benzene ring
answers.c: Thiocyanate group on the 5th carbon of benzene ring
answers.d: Thiocyanate group on the 6th carbon of benzene ring

questions.question: 5.PBS Buffer is used because it is :
